data.title: They have Mastered The Donut
data.text: Master's has been in business as long as I can remember.  They are a "mom & pop" place.  Always friendly, always happy to see you.  No matter what you want - they have it.  Ham & Cheese Croissant sandwiches are awesome.  Bear Claws have something special - not sure what, but they make the best.

data.title: Family friendly donuts
data.text:
While driving down Sunset, we felt like donuts and popped in for a few..

Really friendly staff.. affordable..

We picked up six donuts and they were good.

We would go back.

data.title: Great
data.text: Very good  Great service would recommend this to anyone  my son and granddaughter love this place Great selection of done it

data.title: Great Donuts!
data.text:
My family has been coming here for years.
Always fresh, always friendly.
Hard working -  family run business.
The only local donut shop we go to.

data.title: Great customer service
data.text: I wanted to purchase a dozen donuts as a thank you to a business.  After reading yelp comments, etc. I decided to try Master Donuts and what a wonderful location.  The counter staff was so courteous, helpful and friendly.  I did not actually taste any of their items, but based upon the number of diners in the shop and the number of customers who took coffee, donuts, etc. to go was amazing.  Obviously the menu stock is sold out quickly and, thus, quite fresh.  It is a very bright and clean shop with easy parking.  Will have to try a sample or two of their menu items soon.
